Trade/Device Name(s): MAJOR III Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary blood from the fingertip
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): MAJOR III Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MAJOR III Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary blood from the fingertip for use at home (OTC) or in clinical settings by health care professionals as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control.
